MCGOWAN / STILLER / BARRYMORE / ALBA / LEE / DEPP / VIRGO




(All 7 of the=
m climb aboard Train Wreck...)

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Sou=
lstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 01, 2001 2=
:23 AM
  Subject: Re: Chivtron base attack...


  Train Wreck: Get aboard.
=

  Deemos and Holocaust step aboard Train Wreck.

  Deemos: This time, like=
 last time, at least one of them are going to die...

    ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
    From: *Orchid* 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: =
Saturday, June 30, 2001 11:19 PM
    Subject: Re: Chivtron base attack...

=

    MCGOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / LEE / ALBA / DEPP / VIRGO




    McGo=
wan: Ride? It's really up to you if you want to give us a ride, whatever yo=
ur name is. I'm just as happy walking.



    Virgo: Well I'm happy running=
 so I can kill those sons of b*tches faster. I need a good run...I think...=
.Can we please go now?....
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: =
Soulstice Omega 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, Ju=
ne 30, 2001 9:30 PM
      Subject: Re: Chivtron base attack...


      Trai=
n Wreck pulls up near them.

      Train Wreck: Ready yet?

      Deemos: Y=
eah, we are.

      Train Wreck: Need a ride?

      Deemos: What do the re=
st of you think?

      Deemos posed that question to McGowan's group and B=
anzai-Tron and Sharpedge...

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        =
From: Alloran2@... 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: S=
aturday, June 30, 2001 3:01 PM
        Subject: Re: Chivtron base attack...=



        :::Sharpedge/Banzai-Tron::: 

        Sharpedge: Finally!  We ma=
ke our assault! 
        Banzai-Tron: I can't wait! 
        ::They give ea=
ch other a high five and get ready to go::
